data.title: Passenger information touch kiosks
data.meta_description: Inform passengers on their transit points with passenger information touch kiosks, IPM France offer kiosk to SNCF and RATP
data.text:
An interactive kiosk in public areas to provide information to travellers

As a specialist in rugged outdoor kiosks for public spaces, IPM France has created traveller information kiosks for primary operators in the French transport sector, including the SNCF and RATP.

“Urbam” interactive RATP kiosks: 75 outdoor touch-screen kiosks implemented along metro platforms and outdoors near bus shelters. They provide travellers with information about their trip, itineraries, nearby services and more.

Multimodal interactive SNCF kiosks: 40 multimodal information kiosks to provide service users with itineraries integrating various modes of transport (bus, metro, bicycle, etc.)
